I had a pet hamster called Lily who died!

My hamster was a Syrian hamster which is one of the biggest hamsters out of the family.

Did you know? A hamsters whiskers can move up and down 30 times in one second

The hamster above looks like my hamster Lily. Cute!!! When hamster eat they sometimes store it in there pouches like this I think it is cute!

This is my favourite emoji as it is a hamster and I love them. A hamster normally lives up to 2 years.
